mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pw, nickname, email) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{email})
mapper.select: select exists(select 1 from member where id=#{id});
select exists(select 1 from member where nickname=#{nickname});
select exists(select 1 from member where email=#{email});
select mId from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
select mId, id, pw, nickname, email from member where mId=#{mId}
mapper.update: update member set id=#{id}, pw=#{pw}, nickname=#{nickname}, email=#{email} where mId=#{mId}
